1.text: Put a tick (✔)in the box if you say "Thank you" to the following.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Put a tick (✔)in the box if you say "Thank you" to the following.</prosody></speak>

2.text: a) "Wait, I'll help you." b) "What's the time now?" c) "Your dress is so beautiful." d) "Can you give this to me?" e) "Here you are. Use this pen."
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a) "Wait, I'll help you." b) "What's the time now?" c) "Your dress is so beautiful." d) "Can you give this to me?" e) "Here you are. Use this pen."</prosody></speak>

4.text: Match the expressions with the possible situations.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Match the expressions with the possible situations.</prosody></speak>

5.text: A B Thank you You say thank you for a gift
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>A B Thank you You say thank you for a gift</prosody></speak>

6.text: It's alright A friend thanks you for helping her to do homework
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's alright A friend thanks you for helping her to do homework</prosody></speak>

7.text: You're welcome You forgot to bring your friend's story book. When you tell her this, she replies....
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>You're welcome You forgot to bring your friend's story book. When you tell her this, she replies....</prosody></speak>

8.text: It's my pleasure You ask for an extra pen
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's my pleasure You ask for an extra pen</prosody></speak>

9.text: It's nice of you Your friend opens the door for you
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's nice of you Your friend opens the door for you</prosody></speak>

10.text: Here you are You visit a friend's mother in the hospital
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Here you are You visit a friend's mother in the hospital</prosody></speak>
